page.title: 05Buildings in Bradfield
page.content: In our area there are about 25 occupied buildings.They are all over 150 years old,many much older.Most of them have or are being carefully restored.They are all built from local stone;gritstone and sandstone. The roofs are stone slabs.The windows are small,often with small panes.Large stone slabs often surround the windows and support the stone work over the doors.Most properties were probably once farms or farmworkers cottages.Many are now occupied by people who work in Sheffield.One lady kept a paddock for her two horses and rented the rest of her land.Many of them had outbuildings (stables,barns etc.)attached to them.Some of them had lovely gardens.
